CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AgriFlow Solutions relative to CropConnect Logistics?
SRP.A: AgriFlow Solutions is {below} CropConnect Logistics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AgriFlow Solutions relative to TerraTrade Network?
SRP.A: AgriFlow Solutions is {above} TerraTrade Network in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing TerraTrade Network relative to AgriFlow Solutions?
SRP.A: TerraTrade Network is {below} AgriFlow Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {AgriFlow Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {TerraTrade Network}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AgriFlow Solutions's minimum Food Waste in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AgriFlow Solutions's minimum Food Waste is in {1969}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is TerraTrade Network's maximum Food Waste in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: TerraTrade Network's maximum Food Waste is in {1969}.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1973, did the total Food Waste experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total food waste between 1972 and 1973 was {larger} than between 1982 and 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1971 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1971 was {lower} than in 1980.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1969 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1969 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1969 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1969 was {higher} than in 1973.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {AgriFlow Solutions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did TerraTrade Network and AgriFlow Solutions first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: TerraTrade Network and AgriFlow Solutions did not exchange leading positions.
